entry.tran: （到处跟随偶像的）流行乐团迷，流行歌手迷，粉丝（尤指少女）
entry.def: A groupie is someone, especially a young woman, who is a fan of a particular pop group, singer, or other famous person, and follows them around.

means.word_mean: 1. an enthusiastic young fan (especially a young woman who follows rock groups around)

auth_sentence.content: I do not mean...I have become a cinema groupie, attaching myself to film-makers.
